snippet: A poll carried out in France, Germany, Italy, Poland, Spain and Britain found that a more resilient European economy was helping to restore faith in the bloc.
abstract: Pew Research Center survey finds faith in European Union is being restored in Europe, in spite of critical political parties that threaten to divide and polarize voters.
lead_paragraph: A poll carried out in France, Germany, Italy, Poland, Spain and Britain found that a more resilient European economy was helping to restore faith in the bloc.

headline.main: Support for the European Union Is Rising, Survey Suggests
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Views of E.U. Rebounding, Survey Finds
